code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{fetchCategories,deleteCategory}from'../api/mockApi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CategoryList=()=>{const[categories,setCategories]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchCategories().then(data=>setCategories(data));},[]);const handleDelete=id=>{deleteCategory(id).then(()=>{setCategories(categories.filter(category=>category.id!==id));});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl mb-4",children:"Category List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/add-category",className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 mb-4 inline-block rounded hover:bg-blue-600",children:"Add Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-2",children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:category.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:category.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"border px-4 py-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/edit-category/${category.id}`,className:"bg-yellow-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded mr-2 hover:bg-yellow-600",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(category.id),className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded hover:bg-red-600",children:"Delete"})]})]},category.id))})]})]});};export default CategoryList;
